divs: Sighting Detailswe were driving the bright flickering light i thought it was a spotlight of some sort it flickered it was long and it gave off alot of light but no sound, but a little wind at first i thought it was a spot light, then i started feeling cold kinda scared, i was still wondering what the hell was wrong with the car. after we were sitting in the car on the side of the road like a mile back from where we came but somehow the car was back on but it was like ice cold inside and i always have the heater on during the winter. i didnt lose sight of it , it was just gone ps the paint on the hood was like it went through a sand storm.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Fallbrook
There were no other sightings in Fallbrook on or around December 21st 1993
Summary: we were driving and the car started to shut down and we saw an orangish long light
